title: AWS Infrastructure Automation
description: Automated AWS EC2 provisioning, IAM role management, and S3 lifecycle policies using CloudFormation and Terraform.

title: DevOps Pipeline with Jenkins
description: Built a CI/CD pipeline for Java applications with Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes, enabling automated testing and deployments.

title: MECM/SCCM Patch Compliance Dashboard
description: Developed a PowerShell-based dashboard to monitor and report patch compliance across 5000+ global assets.

title: VMware Environment Optimization
description: Performed VM lifecycle automation, optimized ESXi cluster workloads, and integrated monitoring with Datto RMM.
